# Virtual environment
venv/
ENV/
env/

# Python cache
__pycache__/
*.pyc
*.pyo
*.pyd

# IDE settings
.vscode/
.idea/

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Logs
*.log

# Environment variables
*.env
.env.*

# Byte-compiled / optimized / DLL files
*.python-version
*.so
*.dylib
*.dll

# Flask instance folder
instance/
